casebody.data:
No. 1357,

Misc.

Sostre v. Desmond, Chief Judge, et al. Petitioner pro se. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Paxton Blair, Solicitor General, William D. Bresinhan, Assistant Attorney General, and Julius L. Sackman for respondents.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of mandamus denied.
